00019 #ifndef JT07022008_types_font_HPP_DEFINED
00020 #define JT07022008_types_font_HPP_DEFINED
00021 
00022 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00023 # pragma once
00024 #endif
00025 
00026 namespace egui { namespace types {
00027 struct font;
00028 
00029 struct font_weight {
00030     enum type {
00031         dont_care = 0,
00032         thin = 100,
00033         extra_light = 200,
00034         light = 300,
00035         normal = 400,
00036         medium = 500,
00037         semi_bold = 600,
00038         bold = 700,
00039         extra_bold = 800,
00040         heavy = 900
00041     };
00042 };
00043 
00044 struct font_base : resource_top {
00045     typedef resource_top::id_type_ptr id_type_ptr;
00046     typedef resource_top::id_type id_type;
00047     typedef resource_top::do_clone do_clone;
00048 
00049     struct info_type {
00050         info_type(const string & name = string(), int height = 12);
00051         string name;
00052         int height;
00053         font_weight::type weight;
00054         bool italic;
00055         bool underline;
00056         bool strike_out;
00057         int width;
00058         int quality;
00059         int output_precision;
00060         int clip_precision;
00062         int escapement;
00064         int orientation;
00065         int charset;
00066         int pitch_and_family;
00067 
00072         void height_in_points(int point_height);
00073 
00074         bool bold() const;
00075         void bold(bool b);
00076     };
00077 protected:
00078     font_base(id_type_ptr p) ;
00079     font_base(id_type id = 0);
00080     template<class other> font_base(const other & o, const do_clone& c) : resource_top(o, c) {}
00081 
00082 public:
00083     info_type info() const;
00084     void info(const info_type & inf);
00085 
00086 private:
00087     void create(const info_type& font_info);
00088     void recreate(void * logfont);
00089 };
00090 
00091 struct temporary_font : resource<temporary_font, font, font_base> {
00092     typedef resource<temporary_font, font, font_base> base_type;
00093     temporary_font(id_type id = 0);
00094     temporary_font(const font& src);
00095 };
00096 
00097 struct font : resource<font, temporary_font, font_base> {
00098     typedef resource<font, temporary_font, font_base> base_type;
00099 
00100     // always copying a resource object used by clients (i.e., not temporary), will clone the original object
00101     font(const font & other) : base_type( other.clone() ) {}
00102 
00103     font(const temporary_font & other);
00104     font( font_base::info_type fnt_info);
00105 };
00106 
00107 }}
00108 
00109 #endif
